channel.title: Recruiting for my SRSCP
channel.description:
I have decided to start a project called SRSCP(ShimmyShines Runescape Control Panel).. I have not been able to start it... Why I do not know CSS... So I am recruiting some people to help me out.. You [size=2]WILL[/size] get credit, an advertismenet on the site, and 1 more thing weither it be your server added to my [url=http://shimmystatus.co.nr]status[/url] page for free or w/e you wish to have. But I am recruiting people who know stuff in these subjects Recruiting - How many I need [ul][*]php Scripters. - 2 [*]Css Scripters. - 2 [*]Java Programmers. - 2 [*]SQL Scripters. - 2 [*]JavaScripers - 2[/ul]
I was thinking of making one for SQL servers, and one for SQL servers.
The stuff I want to add to the SRSCP will be this [ul][*]Highscore. [*]Registration - Done(May need some touching up) [*]Play runescape on your browser. [*]Lost password recovery - Done(May need some touching up) [*]Status & Amt of players in your Banner. [*]Admins Page. [*]Mods page. [*]Members forums. [*]News page. [*]Runescape layout. [*]Login [*]View online users(On the page & Ingame!) [*]Some other stuff.[/ul]
Also all developers get a free copy of the SRSCP once it is complete!
If you have any suggestions or questions(Prefer Suggestions) you can email me here : [QUOTE]shimmscape@yahoo.com[/QUOTE]
Or PM me or reply here
Thanks
ShimmyShine[br][size=1]Posted at: July 31, 2006, 04:31:01 PM[/size][hr]Update.. All of the successfull pages added are as listed [LIST][*]Rules [*]Affiliates [*]Report Abuse [*]Item List [*]Downloads [*]Help [/LIST]
And you can see a preview of it [url=http://24.144.125.82:2000/SRSCP/Images/preview.jpg]here[/url]..
Enjoy
ShimmyShine

I have decided to start a project called SRSCP(ShimmyShines Runescape Control Panel)… I have not been able to start it… Why I do not know CSS… So I am recruiting some people to help me out… You [size=2]WILL[/size] get credit, an advertismenet on the site, and 1 more thing weither it be your server added to my status page for free or w/e you wish to have.
